WorkItem.Description: When you implement a drag drop effect for TabControl, it would be better if it shows current dragging tabpage's content along with mouse. The content looks like a thumbnail image go along with your mouse point when dragging.

Comments.Message:
Hello Kira

Thank you for using our code sample request service. 

Based on my understanding, your request consists of two technical points:

1) How to  support drag&drop in TabControl of WinForms
2) How to create a thumbnail image of a tab page, and show the thumbnail image while user is dragging a tab. 

If I misunderstood your requirement, please let me know. My team is evaluating the requirement. It would take some time. To help you quickly get started, here is a code sample from codeproject that demonstrates the tech point 1 (drag&drop in TabControl). And here is a forum thread talking about how to generate a thumbnail image from a Winform control. 

I hope that you have a wonderful day! 
Thanks
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework
http://1code.codeplex.com
